Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. DESCRIPTION: The image shows a kitchen with a large island in the center. The island has a built-in stove top and a sink. Above the island, there is a decorative light fixture. The kitchen cabinets are dark wood, and the countertops appear to be a light color, possibly marble or granite. The flooring is a light-colored hardwood. There are windows on the wall behind the island, allowing natural light into the room. The overall style of the kitchen is modern with
